Modeling As a senior security consultant for the Illinois State Highway Authority my primary responsibility is to design implement audit and manage the overall security of the Ecommerce solution Implement audit and manage PCIDSS Level 1 compliance work closely with SecurityNetwork Operating Center team and integrate solutions within the NIST Cybersecurity Framework The website wwwillinoistollwaycom has over 2 million transactions per day and there have been zerosuccessful data breaches or failed compliance audits since I started This is a strategic handson role that
